TopicTitle: Black NavBalls in customized RPM screens.

Articles.Content:
So, i've been using the ALCOR capsule for a while, but today, when I went into IVA, it showed black. I updated RPM (I use CKAN for all the mods) but it remained the same. I looked into other capsules, and I found out that it only happens with customized screens beacuse it was black too in the Near Future Ships, but, when using the MK3 Capsule, it worked perfectly. What could it be? it is black but I can see the Prograde/Retrogade etc. Markers. - Maybe it's a NavBall screen problem? I recently installed Enhanced NavBall... That might be it...
